backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a manga watchlist backend with user profiles, manga entry CRUD operations, pagination (30 per page), access control via MixinAuthorization, and blob storage integration for cover images.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented styling changes including gold text/icons throughout the app, gold card borders with rainbow hover effects, red 'Incomplete' status text, and rainbow 'Complete' status text.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files detailing gold styling, authentication flows, manga CRUD operations, pagination, rainbow effects, chapter decimal support, and backend connection gating.
frontend/docs/PREDEPLOY_LAYOUT_VERIFICAT: Pre-deployment checklist for verifying critical layout components (AppLayout header/footer, MangaListPage rows, AddMangaDialog modal) across mobile/tablet/desktop viewports to catch regressions before deployment.
frontend/docs/REBASELINE_FROM_LIVE.md: Documentation of rebaseline process performed on February 6, 2026 to align codebase with live deployment after draft versions 44-45 introduced layout corruption, establishing verification rules and checklist.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file (content truncated in input) containing OKLCH color system, rainbow animations, scrollbar styling, and custom utilities for the manga watchlist application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, application title describing single-user manga watchlist with Internet Identity and pagination, and root div with inline dark mode styles.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, network-first for API/CSS/navigation, with versioned cache management (v2), precaching of core assets, and message handler for cache clearing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component that handles authentication flow, profile setup, and renders MangaListPage. Registers service worker on mount and shows loading/login states based on Internet Identity authentication status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Button component that toggles Internet Identity login/logout, clearing query cache, manga cache, cover images, and service worker cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, prompting for name input with form validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/layout/APP_LAYOU: Regression test checklist for AppLayout component covering header collapse/expand behavior, sticky positioning, footer placement, and responsive behavior across viewports.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper with collapsible sticky header, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution. Supports custom header content via props.
frontend/src/components/manga/ADD_MANGA_: Regression test checklist for AddMangaDialog ensuring proper scrolling, fixed header, 400px max-height body constraint, and accessibility across mobile, tablet, and small laptop viewports.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: Modal dialog for adding new manga entries with form fields for title, alternate titles, genres (with custom genre creation), cover images, synopsis, chapters, status, and rating. Includes form validation and backend connection checks.
frontend/src/components/manga/AutoScroll: Component that auto-scrolls long titles vertically with bottom-to-top animation, pausing on hover and detecting overflow dynamically.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverHover: A draggable popup component that displays manga cover images with title cycling, synopsis, and action buttons (edit, notes, bookmark). Uses persistent position storage and cached cover images.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: Form field component for uploading and managing manga cover images with file upload, progress tracking, and image removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditMangaD: Dialog component for editing manga entries with fields for title, alternate titles, genres, cover images, synopsis, and chapter counts. Computes delta updates and handles custom genre creation.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditNotesD: Simple dialog component for editing manga notes with a textarea, save/cancel buttons, and backend connection status handling.
frontend/src/components/manga/FloatingCo: Collapsible sticky panel that wraps MangaListControls, providing expand/collapse functionality for filters and search controls.
frontend/src/components/manga/GenreCheck: Displays genres in a 3-column grid with checkboxes, dynamically measuring and aligning items to ensure uniform column widths per row.
frontend/src/components/manga/MANGA_LIST: Comprehensive checklist document for verifying MangaListPage layout integrity, covering structure, alignment, overflow, loading states, and responsive behavior across viewports.
Displays a manga entry card with cover image, title cycling, rating/bookmark/notes controls, chapter progress editing, and hover popups. Handles mutations for rating, bookmarks, notes, completion status, and chapter progress using custom hooks.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListC: Renders filter and sort controls for the manga list including title/synopsis/notes search inputs, genre checkboxes, bookmarked/completed filters, sort options, watchlist alignment selector, and an add manga button.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Main manga list page component that fetches all manga entries, applies filtering/sorting/pagination, manages connection state with retry logic, displays loading/error states, and renders manga rows with controls. Handles offline mode and auto-prunes invalid genre selections.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaRowAc: Wraps a MangaCard with edit and delete action buttons, managing EditMangaDialog and delete confirmation AlertDialog states. Handles manga deletion with loading states and backend readiness checks.
frontend/src/components/manga/NotesPrevi: Renders a fixed overlay portal displaying manga notes text in a styled box when visible, used for hover previews.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Provides pagination UI with previous/next buttons, clickable page numbers with ellipsis for large page counts, and a jump-to-page input field. Clamps page numbers to valid range.
frontend/src/context/BackendConnectionCo: Creates a React context and provider for a singleton backend connection instance, preventing multiple competing connection loops. Exports a hook to access the connection state that must be used within the provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, initializing access control with an admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Provides an extended actor interface with connection state tracking and retry functionality by delegating to the singleton backend connection hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Fetches all manga entries from the backend with offline caching support using both IndexedDB (per-principal) and localStorage, falling back to cached data on network errors.
Manages backend actor initialization and readiness with hard timeouts, bounded retry logic, session generation for race condition prevention, and comprehensive diagnostic tracking including automatic timeout safeguards.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectionS: Provides access to the singleton backend connection state from the BackendConnectionContext to ensure only one connection attempt loop is active.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Exposes backend readiness state by delegating to the singleton connection hook and mapping connection status to readiness status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCachedCoverImageUr: Returns a cover image URL preferring cached blob from IndexedDB when available, falling back to network URL while asynchronously fetching and caching in the background.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and saving the current user's profile, with proper connection dependency handling and backend readiness checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication with AuthClient, providing login/logout functionality, identity state management, and a React context provider for authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Extracts and returns a sorted list of unique genres from all manga entries in the library.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Provides mutations for adding, updating, rating, bookmarking, and updating notes for manga entries with query invalidation and error classification.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaPage.ts: Hook for paginated manga data (file content truncated).
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistentPopupPos: React hook that manages draggable popup position with localStorage persistence, window resize handling, and viewport clamping to keep the popup visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useUniformWatchlistRo: React hook that measures and synchronizes row widths across watchlist items using ResizeObserver, handling dynamic content changes and image loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with black and gold color palette defined in both RGB and OKLCH color spaces, including custom utility classes for gold theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/sw/registerServiceWorker.ts: Service worker registration utilities with update detection and cache clearing functionality for offline support.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorClassific: Error classification system that categorizes backend errors (timeout, authorization, transient, etc.) and determines retry behavior with user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/backendNotReadyMessag: Utility providing a consistent error message and assertion function for backend connection readiness checks.
frontend/src/utils/formatChapterNumber.t: Formats chapter numbers for display, showing integers without decimals and preserving decimal points when present.
frontend/src/utils/indexedDb.ts: Generic IndexedDB wrapper providing CRUD operations for manga metadata and cover image stores with promise-based API.
frontend/src/utils/offlineCoverImageInde: IndexedDB-based cache for manga cover images keyed by principal, stableId, and URL hash, with fetch-and-store and cleanup utilities.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaCache.ts: Legacy localStorage-based cache for manga entries with serialization/deserialization functions to handle BigInt and complex types, supporting versioned cache data.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaIndexedDb: IndexedDB-backed manga metadata cache with per-principal namespacing, providing async read/write/clear operations for offline manga entry storage.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Utility functions to wrap promises with hard timeouts, providing TimeoutError class and helper functions for timeout-based promise rejection.
frontend/src/utils/retryBackoff.ts: Bounded exponential backoff retry utility with jitter, configurable delays, total time limits, per-operation timeouts, and a RetryManager class for manual retry control.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities supporting both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and functions to extract, store, and clear parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a black and gold themed design system with custom colors using CSS variables, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document for a manga/anime watchlist app, listing implemented features for gold/rainbow theming, status colors, rating displays, and chapter editing functionality.
